text: Tomadera aparadha habe na yadi tomara talaka da'o stridera yadera ekhana'o tomara sparsa karo ni ba deya yadera jan'ya dharya karo ni. Ara tadera jan'ya byabastha karo, dhanabanera ksetre tara samarthya anusare o abhabira ksetre tara samarthya anusare, byabastha habe purodasturabhabe. Satkarmidera jan'ya ekati kartabya.
